ComicInfo.Summary: Crime appears to be gone forever, but Sabre just can't let it go, and drags Zenith and Null along on his search for answers, despite physical consequences to even asking too many questions. Meanwhile, there are consequences in the lives of the suddenly-retired heroes, and the imprisoned Oculus appears to have been using his downtime to help humanity...
ComicInfo.Title: Episode Three
ComicInfo.Locations: The Hague,Iceland,Halcyon Underwater Headquarters,New York City
